seo: salon website design, booking platform for salons, Studio No. 1 website
name: Studio No. 1
shortDescription: Learn how we unified Studio No. 1's booking system into a seamless platform, simplifying client bookings and strengthening their brand.
title: Salon Website Design | Unified Booking Platform for Studio No. 1
teaser: Our salon website design for Studio No. 1 streamlined booking and created a cohesive brand, enhancing the client experience. See the results now!
intro: Studio No. 1, a beauty salon housing independent contractors, needed a unified platform to streamline the booking process and create a professional, team-oriented online presence.
role: We were responsible for the full project design and development.

problem.header: Decentralized Booking & Lack of Team Cohesion
problem.headerDetail: Studio No. 1 had 15+ independent booking sites for each contractor, creating confusion for clients and making it difficult to maintain a professional, cohesive online presence.

subheaders.subHeaderDetail: Each contractor managed their own booking system, making it hard for clients to locate and book services in one place.
Without a unified site, the brand appeared fragmented, reducing the salon’s overall professional image.

goal.header: Build a Centralized Booking Hub for All Team Members
goal.headerDetail: Our primary goal was to feature all team members prominently and allow clients to easily book services from their preferred contractor or discover new services from others.

subheaders.subheader: Feature All Contractors in One Place
subheaders.subHeaderDetail: Create a website where clients can view all team members and their services without leaving the main site.
Redirect clients seamlessly to each contractor’s personal booking page for a smooth and efficient experience.
Promote a professional image by representing all contractors under the Studio No. 1 brand.

impact.header: Enhanced Client Experience & Improved Professional Image
impact.headerDetail: The new platform improved client satisfaction by making it easy to book with preferred contractors and strengthened Studio No. 1’s brand image.

subheaders.subHeaderDetail: Clients now have quick access to all team members, streamlining booking and improving satisfaction.
The unified platform presented a cohesive, professional image that represented all contractors as part of a team.

ideation.headerDetail: Planning focused on organizing contractor pages and ensuring an intuitive user experience that emphasized Studio No. 1’s team approach.

subheaders.subHeaderDetail: Designed navigation so users could find each contractor quickly from the homepage.
Maintained cohesive branding across all contractor pages to enhance the sense of unity.

testing.headerDetail: Gathered feedback from clients and contractors to ensure ease of use and smooth navigation across the platform.

subheaders.subHeaderDetail: Tested with real clients to confirm navigation to contractor pages was intuitive.
Verified that booking redirects worked correctly for each contractor’s page.

final.headerDetail: The final product delivered an easy-to-navigate website with cohesive design and direct booking access.

subheaders.subHeaderDetail: Each contractor’s profile is prominently displayed, creating a professional team atmosphere.
Clients can book directly from the Studio No. 1 website, avoiding multiple sites.

development.headerDetail: Developed from scratch, focusing on creating a centralized platform with each contractor’s booking link.

subheaders.subHeaderDetail: Handled both front-end and back-end development for a functional, visually consistent platform.
Integrated each contractor’s personal booking link seamlessly.

future.headerDetail: Future updates could include service descriptions, promotions, or client loyalty features.
